channel.title: Connecticut on Contact United States Senators and Governors
channel.description: Recent content in Connecticut on Contact United States Senators and Governors

item.title: Bob Stefanowski for governor 2022
item.description: Bob Stefanowski for governor Bob Stefanowski grew up in a family like many of us are blessed to have. His roots are on Dixwell Avenue in New Haven, where his family lived in a three-family home. Having his grandparents on the first floor meant lots of stories about how his family came to America through Ellis Island from Poland. Bob’s great grandmother shucked oysters in Fair Haven, he’s always been proud to have a family history in some of the world’s finest oysters!
